GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object containing one user corresponding to username if exists

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing one article corresponding to article_id if exists
